title: Signed up for PBE, is it my time?

replies.body: I'm gonna upvote you for the sake of ourselves galio mains

> [{quoted}](name=Xysle,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKicFcxt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-02T23:20:48.318+0000)
>
> I'm gonna upvote you for the sake of ourselves galio mains

Thanks bb. i will pray that his w stays in his kit somehow someway and not be thrown together as part of another spell (like a new ult based off old ult and old w)

> [{quoted}](name=Galiö,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKicFcxt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-02T23:23:25.367+0000)
>
> Thanks bb. i will pray that his w stays in his kit somehow someway and not be thrown together as part of another spell (like a new ult based off old ult and old w)

I would be surprised if it isn't changed significantly.  Galio's w has the same arbitrary strengths against some champs that Poppy's old passive had (the one where if an attack did more than a certain % of her health, the damage was cut in half).  To give an example, if ashe is attacking Galio (with his w active) and she activates her q, her damage will actually decrease.  Since Galio's W only counts instances of damage, the fact that ashe's q splits her auto into 5 instances of damage it actually makes her damage worse.  This is a very confusing and somewhat arbitrary interaction that Riot has been getting rid of in other champs.  This interaction makes Galio arbitrarily strong against any champ that has a dot, and conversely arbitrarily weak against champs with only a few instances of damage that are much stronger than average.

Assuming Galio's w stays in any form (which I think it should), I expect it to heal based on a % of damage the shielded target takes instead of a flat amount that decreases every time you take damage.   I also might expect activating your ult to make the healing stronger on your W, so that you can still do low health ults.

> [{quoted}](name=MidEvilKnight3k,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKicFcxt,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-03-03T20:43:52.961+0000)

Galio's w has the same arbitrary strengths against some champs that Poppy's old passive had (the one where if an attack did more than a certain % of her health, the damage was cut in half).  To give an example, if ashe is attacking Galio (with his w active) and she activates her q, her damage will actually decrease.  Since Galio's W only counts instances of damage, the fact that ashe's q splits her auto into 5 instances of damage it actually makes her damage worse.  This is a very confusing and somewhat arbitrary interaction that Riot has been getting rid of in other champs.  This interaction makes Galio arbitrarily strong against any champ that has a dot, and conversely arbitrarily weak against champs with only a few instances of damage that are much stronger than average.
> 
> Assuming Galio's w stays in any form (which I think it should), I expect it to heal based on a % of damage the shielded target takes instead of a flat amount that decreases every time you take damage.   I also might expect activating your ult to make the healing stronger on your W, so that you can still do low health ults.

So then it would end up being flat dmg reduction like all ult, his old ult, and ww new e... But increased with healing. Interesting. Plus shielding a squishy will keep you SUPER alive. No wonder he looks so proud and strong while helmet bro and lux look so beat up.
not a galeo main but upvoting for the same reason

Q-How long do you have to wait for a PBE acc
A-About 8 years

Q-Isn't that longer then the game has been out
A-Yep

Q-How would you know
A-I waited that long

Q-Is PBE fun at least?
A-If your willing to wait 20 mins for a game

Q-Well everything is unlocked right? I can get champ riven and other exclusives?
A-Nope ^.^ Just have a ton of RP & IP, skins are 1 ip tho.

Q-Well... I can still get those skins from the skin rotations right?
A-Nope, never updated. Wanted to see what winter chests were like? Had to buy em on a real server.

Q-Galio Update?
A-Sure if your fine with people who have slightly better net instalocking 

Q-What about draft
A-We only have ranked draft and blind.

Q-So I'll do ranked draft.
A-See question 4 but add 5 years

Q-...
A-Yep


THIS HAS BEEN Q&A 
Hope this answered some questions!

Stupid quoting mechanics....


& Add me :D

Protip!

When you're trying to make >.> on a new line, put \\ in front of it. This tells the encoder to ignore the special formatting that symbol would represent.

Example: \\>.> becomes

\>.>
Tyla senpai!

>Q-Well everything is unlocked right? I can get champ riven and other exclusives?
A-Nope ^.^ Just have a ton of RP & IP, skins are 1 ip tho.

I have a PBE account and you actually start with 0 RP 0 IP.  Champions and skins are 1 IP though so it's really easy to get everything after a co-op vs ai.  Runes however are the same cost in IP.  No idea why.  Also accessories like hextech and stuff are the same; no discount. 

>Q-Well... I can still get those skins from the skin rotations right?
A-Nope, never updated. Wanted to see what winter chests were like? Had to buy em on a real server.

True. No UFO Corki skin to try out or King Rammus. You either had to play in the beta for LOL or tough luck.

Once you get to level 30 you should get maxed out resources.


You can get vault items from mystery gifting/hextech crafting still..
I got ice tobogan corki..
Now why can't i have that luck on a live server.
It gets updated so that the day after you log in the first time you are automatically leveled to 30 and receive 100k IP and 40k RP.

It does seem like it is your time.

As someone who was utterly pleased with his main getting reworked, I honestly have nothing but good blessings for you.
Riot really seems to have gotten the hang of these reworks and I am sure it will be different but still hold the same core values and appeal of Galio.

Godspeed, my friend. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Galiö,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKicFcxt,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-03-03T01:47:15.927+0000)
>
> Who was your main that got reworked?

Talon. {{champion:91}} 
And let me tell you, I was worried as sin, but the result was something beyond my expectations.

They also redid {{champion:41}} who was my very first champion and a champ i played casually still every now and then for sentimental reasons and his rework was phenomenal as well.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaddyFantome,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EKicFcxt,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-03-03T15:01:36.168+0000)
>
> Talon. {{champion:91}} 
> And let me tell you, I was worried as sin, but the result was something beyond my expectations.
> 
> They also redid {{champion:41}} who was my very first champion and a champ i played casually still every now and then for sentimental reasons and his rework was phenomenal as well.

Talon was some interesting but in a way small changes... still much healthier than his silence days atleast. 
GO had huge differences but still is similar without the cheese minion sacrifice or team buffs he used to do. 
I feel GP was a successful rework. Th other than visually I'm not a huge fan of Poppy (Even though the older one was meh as Well)  and i do not like the new trick at all (other than visually) even though the older version was kept weak cause his kit ended up being u healthy if they rebuffed him. 
Thats what worries me. I didn't like those two reworks the most other than what they look like and that's who is working on Galio. And so far from the teaser I'm so so on what he looks like. So if I'm not pleased with the visual and the gameplay that might be a game killer for me for a while.

Overall, i feel their consistency with the reworks has been solid.
Katarina, Leblanc, Brand, Malz were also great. 
Warwick is almost universally praised.

If Galio turns out a mess, i will be genuinely shocked.

I may try him in the PBE if I get it but Idk  if I care for this in the slightest.
